__TOC__

This page collects a bunch of maybe useful dbus-send magics to extract information from NM or even invoke some feature(e.g. like activate/deactivate devices, etc.).

==== GetDevices (List) ====

<pre>
$ sudo dbus-send \
        --print-reply \
        --system \
        --dest=org.freedesktop.NetworkManager \
        /org/freedesktop/NetworkManager \
        org.freedesktop.NetworkManager.GetDevices
=> method return sender=:1.8 -> dest=:1.164 reply_serial=2
   array [
      object path "/org/freedesktop/Hal/devices/net_00_16_d3_c6_d2_3c"
      object path "/org/freedesktop/Hal/devices/net_00_1d_e0_55_38_e1"
   ]
</pre>

==== Getting Device Type ====

/usr/include/NetworkManager.h: typedef enum NMDeviceType ...

<pre>
$ DEVICE_NAME=/org/freedesktop/Hal/devices/net_00_16_d3_c6_d2_3c # from GetDevices
$ sudo dbus-send \
         --system \
         --print-reply \
         --dest=org.freedesktop.NetworkManager \
         $DEVICE_NAME \
         org.freedesktop.DBus.Properties.Get \
         string:"org.freedesktop.NetworkManager.Device" \
         string:"DeviceType"

=>    variant       uint32 1
</pre>
